feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 3:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: E 58 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
